type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Knight Peasant
rules_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
[i]Bowrange +3[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, you may have target creature you control that attacked this turn deal damage equal to their power to any target.
[i]Villager Origins[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Tobin dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Tobin.
